name: Curry Bowl
description: Build your own delicious bowl. Choose a base (like rice or quinoa), a protein (chicken, paneer, lamb, etc.), a savory sauce, and fresh toppings.

name: Mango Lassi
description: A creamy and refreshing traditional Indian drink made from yogurt, milk, and sweet mango pulp.

name: Paneer Biryani
description: Cubes of Indian cottage cheese (paneer) cooked with fragrant Indian spices and layered with aromatic basmati rice. Served with a side of raita (yogurt sauce).

name: Boneless Chicken Biryani
description: Tender boneless chicken marinated in aromatic Indian spices, slow-cooked and layered with fragrant basmati rice. Served with a side of raita (yogurt sauce).

name: Lamb Bowl
description: Tender boneless lamb slow-cooked in a rich and creamy kurma sauce, served over a bed of fragrant ghee rice.

name: Curry Goat Bowl
description: Authentic bone-in goat meat slow-simmered in a traditional, flavorful curry sauce, served over a bed of fragrant ghee rice.

name: Fire Bowl
description: For spice lovers! A bowl of ghee rice topped with spicy Chicken 65, fried chiles, and a drizzle of chile mayo.

name: Protein Bowl
description: A hearty bowl loaded with ghee rice, tender Chicken Tikka, savory Lamb, and finished with a creamy Kurma Sauce.

name: Desi Tacos (2)
description: An Indian twist on a classic. Your choice of 1-2 proteins, served on warm, flaky paratha bread with Indian-style salad toppings.

name: Lamb Biryani
description: Tender, slow-cooked lamb layered with aromatic spices and fragrant basmati rice. Served with a side of raita (yogurt sauce).

name: Goat Biryani
description: Authentic, tender bone-in goat simmered with fragrant Indian spices and layered with basmati rice. Served with a side of raita (yogurt sauce).

name: Paneer Tikka Masala
description: Grilled paneer cubes simmered in a rich, creamy, and flavorful tomato-based sauce. Served with rice and naan.

name: Chana Masala
description: A classic North Indian dish of tender chickpeas cooked in a flavorful onion, tomato, and spice gravy. Served with rice and naan.

name: Saag Chana
description: A nutritious and hearty curry of chickpeas (chana) and spinach (saag) cooked with ginger, garlic, and spices. Served with rice and naan.

name: Saag Paneer
description: Soft paneer cubes cooked in a smooth, creamy, and vibrant spinach gravy. A beloved classic served with rice and naan.

name: Chicken Kurma
description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a mild, rich, and creamy cashew-based gravy. Served with rice and naan.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Grilled chicken chunks (tikka) simmered in a spectacular creamy, spiced tomato sauce. Served with rice and naan.

name: Butter Chicken
description: A rich and decadent dish of tender chicken in a mildly spiced tomato, butter, and cream sauce. Served with rice and naan.

name: Saag Chicken
description: A wholesome curry of tender chicken pieces cooked in a flavorful and creamy spinach gravy. Served with rice and naan.

name: Lamb Kurma
description: Succulent pieces of lamb slow-cooked in a luxurious, creamy, and mildly spiced cashew-based sauce. Served with rice and naan.

name: Curry Goat
description: Tender bone-in goat meat slow-cooked in a traditional, aromatic, and spicy curry sauce. Served with rice and naan.

name: Veggie Samosa (2)
description: Two crispy, golden-fried pastries filled with a savory mixture of spiced potatoes and peas.

name: Samosa Chaat (12oz)
description: A crushed veggie samosa topped with chickpeas, yogurt, tamarind and mint chutneys, onions, and spices. A flavor explosion!

name: Chicken 65 (12oz)
description: Spicy, bite-sized pieces of deep-fried chicken, bursting with the flavor of ginger, garlic, and red chilies.

name: Ghee Rice (12oz)
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with clarified butter (ghee) and whole spices for a rich, buttery flavor.

name: Biryani Rice (12oz)
description: Fragrant basmati rice slow-cooked with a blend of aromatic whole spices, perfect as a side for any curry.

name: Gulab Jamun (2)
description: Two soft, spongy, deep-fried milk-solid dumplings soaked in a sweet, fragrant sugar syrup.

name: Indian Lemonade
description: A refreshing twist on classic lemonade, infused with Indian spices like cumin and black salt for a unique savory-sweet taste.

name: Real Chai (Hot)
description: Authentic Indian masala chai, brewed with black tea, milk, and a blend of aromatic spices like cardamom, ginger, and cloves.

name: Bottled Water
description: A simple bottle of purified spring water.

name: Limca
description: A popular Indian lemon-lime soda known for its crisp, bubbly, and thirst-quenching flavor.

name: Thumbs Up
description: India's iconic cola, known for its strong, fizzy, and slightly spicy taste.

name: Coke
description: The classic, refreshing taste of Coca-Cola.

name: Sprite
description: A crisp, clean, caffeine-free lemon-lime soda.

name: Fanta
description: Bright, bubbly, and fruity orange flavored soda.

name: Coke Zero
description: The classic taste of Coca-Cola with zero sugar and zero calories.

name: Extra Tikka Masala Sauce (2oz)
description: A 2oz side of our signature creamy and flavorful tomato-based tikka masala sauce.

name: Extra Creamy Spinach (2oz)
description: A 2oz side of our smooth and savory creamy spinach (saag) sauce.

name: Extra Kurma sauce (2oz)
description: A 2oz side of our rich, mild, and creamy cashew-based kurma sauce.
